name: Alone in the Dungeon - Alpha
description:
Adventure and challenge yourself in this retro inspired First Person Dungeon Crawler.

How deep can you go in this infinite dungeon ?

Main Features:

  • Dozens of unique weapons and armors
  • A lot of pixelated enemies to challenge you
  • Rogue lite, you have 1 life, but you can (for now) keep your level and items to try again
  • Procedurally generated dungeons

Planned Features:

  • Even more unique weapons and armors
  • More enemies
  • Additional Tilesets
  • Additional Layout possibilities

This is the first public alpha of Alone in Dungeon, you are free to play (for free) was much as you want and we would love to hear your feedback. :)

The only limitations in this version is the size of Dungeons (they will be considerably bigger) and their Tilesets, as there is only one in this version.

Join our Discord Community to keep up-to-date 

Join our Discord Server  and follow our  Twitter  to keep up with the last updates
